choices: ...climb up on top of your desk.
...climb down the leg of your chair.
...jump into your backpack to find your phone.
1.content: You wake up to the blaring sound of your alarm clock and begin your morning routine. By the time you're downstairs chowing down your breakfast, you hear Tyler finally turn on the shower... Typical, he's always late to your first block science class, which is usually super annoying because he's your lab partner. Also, your car's in the shop for the week, and you don't have time to wait and ask Tyler for ride because that would totally blow your perfect attendance, so you decide to just walk. When you get to the school, you realize your science teacher isn't standing outside your classroom today. Instead there's a super hot blonde woman in a white lab coat, black open toed high heals, and glasses. She looks like a super model, not a substitute teacher... When the bell rings, she politely introduces herself as Ms. Winters as she hands out a batch of freshly baked cookies to the class. You take a bight of one, and find out that they're intoxicatingly delicious. You eat the whole cookie, but suddenly start to feel light headed. The next thing you know, you pass out unconscious and everything goes black. When you wake up, you find yourself naked in a pile of gigantic clothes. You're terrified and confused at first, and you have no idea what just happened... Then you figure out that you're standing in a pile of your own enormous clothes on top of your now giant chair. You've shrunk! You're about an a half inch tall now! You need to find help, so you decide to...
1.title: It's a trap!

choices: A huge hand grabs you,Dr. Winter's ticked
A bigger surprise a huge mouse is in the hole with you
14.content:
"What th- I'm tiny?" You think as you leap from place to place to avoid the now Godzilla sized Dr. Winters or whatever she said her name was from spoofing you but this was easier said than done! As soon as the incredibly hot blonde's piercing blue eyes(why do all the female scientists in the Scifi films have to do so damn hot?) caught wind of you she smiled and said

"Wow! So I see the experiment was a rousing success! Now for the trial run tests." As she reached for you in slow motion probably to tease you or something you moved like lightning running faster than you ever had in your life and as expected Dr. Winters was hot on your trial literally her booming footsteps made the floor quake and twice you fell over but kept at it

"Hey get back here we're not done yet!" She cried reaching out for you again but being that you were a mere inch high your new size had its advantages as you could fit in a lot of places and speaking of which you spotted the exit you have been searching for: a hole in the wall

"Excellent she nor anyone else will never find me there!" You thought as you sought to dart in....
14.title: ...find some place to hide.

choices: Ms. Winters comes back in and plays with all of you
Ms. Winters comes back in and takes you to her house
Your stepmother, Racheal comes in to deliver something you forgot
15.content:
Surely someone will notice you're gone and eventually find you, right? You get comfortable and wait, hoping something will happen. After a minute, you just realize something. Considering how small you are, it might be best to get off the seat so no one sits on you. You shudder at the thought of being crushed by a enormous stinky butt.

Just as you start to move, something lands on you. Everything is dark, making it impossible to see what landed on you. You struggle as you start moving up. You can hear someone laughing. Someone . . familiar. Whatever has you starts shaking, a lot. You struggle as much as you can, though, you don't have much room to fight.

Suddenly, things get a lot brighter and you fall into a jar. You land on something soft. You look down to see that you landed on Zack! He had also been shrunk down. You look around to see other the students had also shrunken down. You look up to see what had grabbed you: Ms. Winters.
"What's going on here? Why have you shrunk us?" You yell. Your substitute teacher simply laughs and leaves the room for a minute. "Zack! What happened? What is going on?!" You demanded. You finally get off of him, giving him room to breathe.

"I don't know, from what I can tell, she isn't our real teacher. She's only here to kidnap us." He said. "At least we're together." He said.

"Right, we'll all figure out how to get out of this situation." You respond, not realizing what he actually meant. Suddenly . . .
15.title: Dropped with the other students

info.brief_description: A sexy mad scientist shrinks you at school, and now you're less than a half inch tall...
info.description:
WARNING THIS INTERACTIVE STORY MAY CONTAIN EXTREMELY GRAPHIC CONTENT THAT MAY NOT BE SUITABLE FOR YOUNGER READERS!

Characters:

Anna (You) - You're a quiet high school girl, and you're very focused on your grades. You're modestly cute, with blonde hair and blue eyes. You stay in shape, so you actually have a decent figure, and you don't really realize how attractive you are.

Tyler - Your super hot stepbrother. He's almost like a real brother because you've been living with him for since you were in elementary school. Everything was fine until he hit puberty and turned into a greek god! He has chocolate brown hair, hazel-green eyes, and perfectly chiseled face. He's captain of the football time, and all the girls at school have a major crush on him (including you). There's also a rumor going around that he has the biggest dick in the whole school...

Racheal - Your step mom who is also a super hot milf. She has dirty blonde hair, hazel eyes, a gorgeous face, and a sexy hour-glass figure. She looks amazing for her age, and she's every boy's wet dream in town.

Jessica - Tyler's girlfriend. She's the hottest girl in the school, with blonde hair, crystal blue eyes, and a fully developed body. She's perfect, but you totally hate each other. Not just because you're kind of jealous, but also because of the way she treats Tyler.

Mike - Your dad. He still treats you like you're still his little 12 y/o princess, and treats Tyler as if he were his actual son. He has dark brown hair and blue eyes, and constantly stays in shape. All of my friends think he's a total dilf.

Zack - He's really your only real friend. He's kind of a geek, but he's surprising ripped. He has chocolate brown hair and pretty hazel eyes, and he's kind of cute. He's had a crush on you for years, but you still haven't figured it out...

Ms. Winters - A young and sexy mad scientist who impersonates your science substitute. She's beautiful, with blonde hair, blue eyes, and a sexy body. She could be a swimsuit model if she wasn't busy creating a size manipulating formula... She bakes an experimental shrinking formula into a batch of cookies that she hands out to you and your class. She also baked one special cookie for herself with a extremely powerful growth formula too...

RULES:

1.) No sexual interaction with characters under 18. (It's illegal)

2.) No breaking character. (Make sure your additions stay true to previous additions)

3.) Additions must at least be 6 complete sentences. (1 sentence additions are a major buzz-kill)

4.) Original Characters are welcome, but only if they fit into the preexisting story!

Have fun! ;)
